messages.subject: Dr. Phil show anyone?
messages.msgSnippet: No matter what great families they might interview, they ll probably find the most outrageous family to put on the air and ridicule the whole concept of
messages.messageBody:
" No matter what great families they might interview,
they'll probably find the most outrageous family to put on the
air and ridicule the whole concept of homeschooling. "

Um...are you sure you're thinking of Dr. Phil? I've never seen anyone
ridiculed (other than some snide comments about dysfunctional behavior
perhaps) on his show. While I don't agree with all his opinions, it's
NOT a free-for-all-be-rude-as-you-like on his show. It's more about
exploring and discussing.

I wouldn't hesitate to be on his show, whether he agreed with me or
not. It's pretty mellow and respectful for the most part.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
